spell.name: Capricorn
spell.combatDescription: * Place The Magician on Capricorn, along with one other card. * The other card must be The High Priestess, The Empress, The Lovers, The Devil, Strength, The Star, The World, or any Queen. * These cards must be played on the same turn. * Either: * Deal 30 Magic Damage (Clever: 60) or * Gain 30 Shield (Clever: 60). * At the end of the turn, discard all cards placed on Capricorn.
spell.skillDescription: * Once per Day, when any player fails a Skill Check, you can use Capricorn to allow them to try again.
